column3: Faculty of Social Sciences and Solvay Business School
column5: Are you interested in the technology sector, setting up an entrepreneurship and IT and innovation from an international perspective? VUB's MSc in Business & Technology considers all of the above at an advanced level. The programme focuses on business aspects of cutting-edge technology and offers high-level courses on various aspects of business, finance, accounting, technology, strategy, analytics and more.
column7: The tuition fee for 2024-2025 will be: EU/EEA students: 1092 €/year Non EU/EEA students 4600 €/year
